lenders.occupational_info: In my job, I help companies understand their business processes and find improvements and potential automations (from computer programs). Our plan is to grow this to a community of working mothers who have the collective power to influence the child care industry.

lenders.occupational_info:
Our mission is to encourage women to relish the fully lived life through purpose living. At womenxchange.com you will find relevant, informative and empowering content all chosen on purpose to help you make quality choices, encourage you to follow your dreams or find out what they are and stir in you a desire to live life to the fullest. 
You will find the site is a place where you can acquire information, gather resources, share your thoughts, encourage each other, give back to society, and unite to make a difference – all one click at a time!

We meet in friendship, fun, caring and prayer.  We believe that the wold community is improved every time someone makes one small contribution somewhere.  This is ours.  

Please feel free to join our team.

lenders.name: Absolute Smile
lenders.occupational_info: Absolute Smile was co-founded in 2004 by Drs. Eric and Boris Friedman. Second generation dentists, they both share the great passion for dentistry .Six years later they still represent the core of a much larger business that combines four modern dental facilities in four different locations in the greater Philadelphia area and Pocono. Dr. Eric Friedman graduated at the top of his class from the University Of Pennsylvania School Of Dentistry in 1999 and then completed post-graduate residency program at the Sacred Heart Hospital in Allentown Pa., where he devoted most of his time in developing and perfecting techniques of cosmetic dentistry. Dr. Boris Friedman successfully graduated from Temple University School of Dentistry in 2000 and immediately enrolled in private practice mastering the skills of Endodontics and Oral Surgery.

lenders.name: Ben Braverman
lenders.loan_because: I am currently in the process of becoming a financial advisor having earned a business degree.  Providing loans to those who are less fortunate is a natural extension of my interest and enthusiasm for adding value and befit to people's lives.
lenders.occupational_info: Much of the public here in the United States, is not fully aware of the options as it relates to investment.  I will help to provide the tools with which people can substantially improve their financial situations.

lenders.name: ginny
lenders.loan_because: I loan through Kiva because of the personal experience they provide between the lender and borrower.  It's not just a transaction, it's a transformation.

lenders.name: Noah
lenders.loan_because: Entrepreneurs, whether big or small, whether starting technology companies or waste management processing facilities, are all filled with ideas and creativity but often starved for capital. If my money can provide the lubricant to create a functioning profitable business for other entrepreneurs then go forth and multiply.
lenders.occupational_info: As a program director I oversee and streamline the efficiency of our various project units and project managers. Through leadership and business process re-engineering, I facilitate cohesive teams focused on accomplishing the mission at hand. I may be the leader but I never forget everyone working on the project is in control and keeping them healthy, happy, and motivated is my priority above all else.

lenders.occupational_info: I am a sculptor.

lenders.loan_because: I care

lenders.name: Kim
lenders.loan_because: I want to help empower women of the world so that they have the opportunity to make a better life for them and their families.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I don't have much but I have a lot more than many people and if I can help someone get on their feet with a small loan, I'll do it.  It feels great helping others!

lenders.name: Alessandro
lenders.loan_because: The more I get to know how banks work, the more I believe in microfinance.

lenders.name: Lorraine
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves help in some form.

lenders.name: Alexander
lenders.loan_because: I can easily afford to lend some money to someone who needs it!
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently doing my Master in International Management at the Instituto de Empresa in Madrid

lenders.name: kathy@kiva.org
lenders.occupation: Regional Director, Europe & Asia at Kiva
lenders.loan_because: It's empowering both for me and for the borrower. Plus, it's fun!
lenders.occupational_info: I manage the team that oversees Kiva's partnerships with microfinance institutions and social enteprises in Europe and Asia.

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed with more than I need.  It feels so good to share, both locally and globally.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a mom.  And a quilter (had my own shop until retirement) Now I have an on-line quilt-shop www.marykenyon.com  and another site  www.youarepreciouscargo.com to spread the word to NOT use cell phones while driving.

lenders.name: Lidia
lenders.loan_because: There have been many times in my life where I required a hand up, this is my way of paying it forward.
lenders.occupational_info: If I can make the difference in someone's life and they in turn pass it on, my 'work' is done.

lenders.name: NickB
lenders.loan_because: Chuck & Josh told me too
lenders.occupational_info: I plan the stock orders, intake, levels per store & deliveries for a multiple shop clothing company.

lenders.name: Maurizio Maranghi
lenders.loan_because: It's just the right thing to do

lenders.name: Tim
lenders.loan_because: I feel privileged to live in a rich area of the world and I wish to help those less fortunate.
lenders.occupational_info: I help create computer systems for a company whose clients are stockbrokers in the UK.

lenders.name: Brienna
lenders.loan_because: I want to help make a difference, and give people opportunities that I feel are taken for granted in America.
lenders.occupational_info: I do testing to verify applications for cell phones meet our company's quality requirements.  We do text messaging and games for iPhones.

lenders.name: Jon
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people thrive in their own lands, even when the conditions make it extremely hard to do so.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in retail selling clothing, and i go to school at Lane Community College for Non Profit.

lenders.name: Marco
lenders.occupational_info: I manage dangerous good transportation (ADR) and industrial waste disposal/recycling

lenders.name: Sonja
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others have a chance to earn enough to live well and help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach Spanish at a university and rescue special needs and senior dogs.

lenders.name: Tomingo
lenders.loan_because:
I loan because I have been looking for an organization that in many ways allowed the people to help others. I am starting my own business (summer of 2010)  and I know how difficult it is to save the money you need in making your business success and I think how I could benefit greatly fromr a loan to help with my business expenses. On the other hand, I do understand that I have plenty of opportunities to achieve my goal; it is not that easy in other counties. So, since I am blessed I am more than honored in helping someone else achieve their dreams.

Tomingo
lenders.occupational_info: I make earrings using a variety of beads and recycled materials. I also use recycled items to make decorative objects for your home.

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: I understand that everybody has hard times and it's during hard times that the human spirit shines.  I loan in hopes that a little good will toward others will pay off by the lifting of that human spirit in others.
lenders.occupational_info: I am self employed in the restaurant business in Central Florida, USA.

lenders.name: Riley and Emily
lenders.loan_because: We loan because we have been helped, and we believe that best way we can show our gratitude for that help is by helping others.
lenders.occupational_info: Emily is an artist and an art student. Riley is a graduate student in sociology and is preparing for law school. We are both active in our local community for human rights and environmental issues.

lenders.name: Lauren
lenders.loan_because: I want people to have the same opportunities that are available to me.

lenders.name: Deetz
lenders.loan_because: I've had a lot of chances in life. I think others should have chances too.

lenders.name: Ellise
lenders.loan_because: I should (:

lenders.name: Nurse Gladys, NZ
lenders.loan_because: "A man makes a living by what he gets; but makes a life by what he gives"
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a nurse in a farming/rural area.

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: everyone deserves to be the given the opportunity to improve their living conditions. This is the least I could do to help!

lenders.name: Jill
lenders.loan_because: prosperity, hard work and the realization of dreams helps us all.
lenders.occupational_info: I live a good life and am happy to try and help others make a difference in their own lives.

lenders.name: Matt
lenders.loan_because: Sometimes the human spirit just needs a little bump.

lenders.name: Matthew
lenders.loan_because: I wish to use that which I have been undeservedly blessed with for the benefit of others to God's glory.
lenders.occupational_info: I help improve people's ability to travel safely and efficiently in cars, buses, bicycles, and walking.

lenders.name: Megan
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people who are trying to help themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I test blood and urine for diseases and health problems, and give the results to the doctor so they can diagnose their patients.

lenders.name: Leila
lenders.loan_because: I think micro-finance is such a great concept and an amazing way to help people.

lenders.name: Shah
lenders.loan_because: help me!

lenders.name: Ean
lenders.loan_because: this is a real way to help abolish poverty.

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the entrepreneurial abilities of people to make their lives, and others, better. I recognise that people often need a 'hand up' not a 'hand out'
lenders.occupational_info:
Healthcare non-profit providing donated and low cost medical equipment and devices in Africa.
Solar and photovoltaic opportunities
Social Enterprise investment

I also feel good when i loan, selfish maybe but there you go...

lenders.occupational_info: Healthcare software

lenders.loan_because: Help a working person to make a living.
lenders.occupational_info: Work in a hospital.

lenders.name: Keira
lenders.loan_because: If you were able to change the world for the better, why wouldn't you?

lenders.name: Bouanga
lenders.loan_because: For agriculture program in Africa.
lenders.occupational_info: "Plantations in our country need to great investments for best result, and I am a "cultivateur with many "hectars" of land.

lenders.name: Diana
lenders.loan_because: Giving a hand up is always better than giving a hand out.  Women are my primary lendees because I believe that strengthening women strenghtens the family first, the community next, and ultimately the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I own a company in the construction industry along with my husband.  He works in the field and with the employees, and I work in the office taking care of the financial end.

lenders.name: Roy
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a factory but my passion is writing and film making.

lenders.name: Johanna Frostensson
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea!

lenders.name: Tanya
lenders.loan_because: I love the whole idea of microfinance.
lenders.occupational_info: Right now I am studying accounting at UofM.  I also work at a local health food store.

lenders.name: June
lenders.loan_because: "I am only one, But still I am one.  I cannot do everything; But still I can do something.  And because I cannot do everything, I will not refuse to do the something that I can do." -Edward Everett Hale

lenders.name: Gaute
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others realize their potential.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with making sure organizations can trust their informations systems (IT).
